title: Spider-Man: With Great Power Comes Great Responsibility (2010) #3
description: A trio of the wall-crawler's most dramatic battles and defining moments of the last decade! Caught in the crossfire of the deadly war between Ezekiel and Morlun! The introduction of the Tony Stark-designed Iron Spider suit! And shocking revelations regarding the legacy of Gwen Stacy! Collecting 2001's AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #30 (the inaugural issue of the JMS/JRJR team, from AMAZING SPIDER-MAN BY JMS ULTIMATE COLLECTION BOOK 1 TPB), AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #509 (Deo's dazzling debut, from AMAZING SPIDER-MAN BY JMS ULTIMATE COLLECTION BOOK 3 TPB) and AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #529 (Garney takes the reins, just in time for CIVIL WAR, from AMAZING SPIDER-MAN BY JMS ULTIMATE COLLECTION BOOK 5 TPB).
